alert.note: Alert for St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:08PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. John The Baptist and north central St. Charles Parishes through 545 PM CDT... At 508 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Laplace. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laplace, Reserve, Norco, New Sarpy and Montz. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 206 and 218. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
